definitions.definition: A strong desire; an itch to do something.
To press; to push; to drive; to impel; to force onward.
To press the mind or will of; to ply with motives, arguments, persuasion, or importunity.
To press hard upon; to follow closely.
To present in an urgent manner; to insist upon.
definitions.example: to urge an argument; to urge the necessity of a case

definitions.definition: To treat with forcible means; to take severe or violent measures with.
definitions.example: to urge an ore with intense heat

definitions.definition: To be pressing in argument; to insist; to persist.
